info.name: Google Crown - Google Login screeen
info.description:
Themed "Google - Simple Log In Page".
The theme is based off an anime called "Guilty Crown" which is set in year 2039, that's why you see the odd year on the copyright string.
'Undertakers', a resistance group fighting against the government.

Industrial version(aka V.2): http://userstyles.org/styles/66260/google-crown-inudstrial-google-login-screeen

I wouldn't recommend using this theme if the resolution 
is lower than 1280x(1024), nor higher than 1980x1080 -due to the background.
info.additionalInfo:
2012-05-26(2)
Red focus on email and password field, with shadow upon hover.
Red 'Sign in'-button and changed font to Verdana.
Aligned 'stay signed in'.

2012-05-26
Login area is now set to a fixed width.
